document_data.name: Simron
document_data.mainbody: '''Simron''' was a [[Zhentilar]] warrior in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], part of the Eastern [[Stonelands]] Company.
document_data.Personality: He was open about not being in a rush to get slain.{{cite book/Crown of Fire/TPB 2002|66|3}}
document_data.Possessions: He wore black armor, and carried a soot-darkened sword during the night of their raid on Shandril Shessair.
document_data.Activities: He formed part of the Eastern [[Stonelands]] company of the [[Zhentilar]].
document_data.Relationships: When trying to seize [[Shandril Shessair]], he was part of [[Karkul Memrimmon]]'s squad.{{cite book/Crown of Fire/TPB 2002|71|4}}
document_data.History:
Simron was part of the Eastern Stonelands Zhentilar company that Karkul Memrimmon led in the capture of Shandril Shessair in late {{yearlink|1357}}. However, he ran away at some point during the battle.

Back at [[Zhentil Keep]], he was personally tortured by [[Manshoon]] as part of his debriefing, then slain.
